sentence.text: This boy was the second child of healthy consanguineous Turkish parents.
The prenatal history was unremarkable but congenital cataracts were noted at birth.
At the time of last examination (3 years), the growth parameters were normal: height 99 cm (25th centile), weight 14 kg (10th–25th centile) and head circumference 48.5 cm (3rd–10th centile).
The only dysmorphic feature was forward facing ear lobes and no dental anomalies were noted.
Abdominal and heart ultrasounds were normal.
